Detailed Description

virtual MDim Edit::draw ( MBitmap *  b,
mg_int_t  x,
mg_int_t  y,
bool  center = false 
)
virtual

This method draws the element on the specified bitmap

Parameters
bA pointer to the destination bitmap
xX offset in element coordinates (percentage of screen width)
yY offset in element coordinates (percentage of screen height)
centerIf true object will be centered at x
Returns
The screen dimensions where the element was drawn
